report.title: Notifications list for warehouse user
report.description: A general purpose list of notifications, filtered by warehouse user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM notifications n #joins# WHERE n.acknowledged=false and n.user_id=#user_id# #order_by#

param.name: source_types
param.description: Comma separated list of source types with each item single quoted, or blank to allow all. Options are 'T' (trigger), 'C' (comment), 'V' (verification).
param.join: JOIN notifications n2 on n2.id=n.id and n2.source_type in (#source_types#)

param.name: system_name
param.description: Name to display instead of admin for system generated notifications
